pullRequest.title: [modbus] Added support for RTU encoding over TCP
pullRequest.bodyText:
Until now, this binding did not did not support RTU encoding over TCP.
This PR adds support for RTU encoding over TCP.
To be specific, the existing the existing tcp Thing has an additional Configuration Parameter rtuEncoded that allows selection between the existing 'TCP over TCP' transport and the new 'RTU over TCP' transport. If not specifically defined, the value of rtuEncoded defaults to false to ensure that there is no effect on existing users.
NOTE: this PR requires the following PRs..

jamod [modbus] add support for RTU encoding over TCP openhab/jamod#8
org.openhab.binding.modbus [modbus] add support for RTU encoding over TCP openhab/openhab-core#1965
